title: Best of the Program | Guest: Newt Gingrich | 7/12/22
description:
Glenn and Stu dig through Hunter Biden's allegedly hacked iCloud account, which is worse than you could imagine. Glenn announces his new morning newsletter, which will have all the vital news you need to be aware of. New York aired a PSA on how to respond to a nuclear attack, so Glenn and Stu discuss the possibility of a nuclear war. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
